articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description:
Strange times these. The human brain has an infinite capacity for making the best of a bad situation. COVID hasn’t gone away, it’s still very much with us. But like Dua Lipa peeps be all like IDGAF. Celsius declares bankruptcy. The $CEL token pumps 9%. The Euro finally reclaimed its dollar peg this week before …
  Crypto Bounces Back. ETH DGAF. YCC Is the Acronym of the Week Read More »
articles.title: Crypto Bounces Back. ETH DGAF. YCC Is the Acronym of the Week
